trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView"> </xref> rutet hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised by elements when you call <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BringIntoView%2A> from that element.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=fullName>denne hendelsen oppstår ved elementer når du kaller <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BringIntoView%2A>fra dette elementet.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BringIntoView%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Generally, this routed event is not handled by the source.
trans-unit.target: Denne rutet hendelsen behandles vanligvis ikke av kilden.

trans-unit.source: Intermediate classes that do not implement scrollable regions or similar concepts that clip content should not handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Mellomliggende klasser som ikke implementerer rullbare områder eller lignende konsepter som Beskjær innhold kan ikke behandle hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The event should be permitted to bubble to parent elements that implement a scrollable region or otherwise specify <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds%2A> `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen må ha tillatelse til å boblediagram overordnede elementer som implementerer et rullbare område eller angi ellers <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds%2A> `false`.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipToBounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: Such parent elements typically provide class handling for the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView> event, which is where the necessary rendering logic occurs whenever a given element requests that it be made viewable within the clipping region.
trans-unit.target: Overordnede elementer gir vanligvis klassen behandling den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView>som er der nødvendig gjengivelse logikken oppstår når et gitt element ber om at det gjøres synlige i beskjæringsområde.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView>

trans-unit.source: Content elements can cause the event to be raised by their content hosts (through calling <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BringIntoView%2A> and raising <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=fullName> from the content host).
trans-unit.target: Innholdselementer kan føre til at den-hendelsen av deres innhold verter (via kaller <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BringIntoView%2A>og vise <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=fullName>fra innhold verten).</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.RequestBringIntoView?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.BringIntoView%2A>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can request logical tree elements to be brought into view with the helper method <xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper.BringIntoView%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: På samme måte kan du be om logiske tre elementene som skal hentes inn i visningen med metoden helper <xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper.BringIntoView%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.LogicalTreeHelper.BringIntoView%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> implements a related but different method <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.ScrollIntoView%2A>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>implementerer en beslektede, men annen metode <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.ScrollIntoView%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.ScrollIntoView%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer hendelsesbehandling på en måte typespesifikke, noe som kan øke hendelsen system effektivitet.

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.RequestBringIntoViewEventHandler> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: Denne implementeringen kaster generisk behandlingsprogrammet som en <xref:System.Windows.RequestBringIntoViewEventHandler>og aktiverer det.</xref:System.Windows.RequestBringIntoViewEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer informasjon om denne implementeringen mønsteret og årsaker til den <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>og [rutet hendelser oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
trans-unit.target: Generell behandlingsprogrammet å kalle på en typespesifikke måte.

trans-unit.source: The target to call the handler on.
trans-unit.target: Målet å kalle behandlingsprogrammet på.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that should be made visible in response to the event.
trans-unit.target: Henter objektet som skal gjøres synlige som svar på hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: This object is typically the same object as returned by <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet er vanligvis det samme objektet som ble returnert av <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The object that called <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BringIntoView*>.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som kalles <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BringIntoView*>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BringIntoView*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangular region in the object's coordinate space which should be made visible.
trans-unit.target: Henter rektangulært område i objektets koordinatsystem som skal gjøres synlige.

trans-unit.source: If the signature of <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BringIntoView%2A> that was invoked to raise the event didn't specify a target rectangle, this property may be the <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty%2A> value of the <xref:System.Windows.Rect> structure.
trans-unit.target: Hvis signaturen for <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BringIntoView%2A>som ble startet opphøye hendelsen ikke har angitt et mål rektangel, denne egenskapen kan være i <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty%2A>verdien for den <xref:System.Windows.Rect>strukturen.</xref:System.Windows.Rect> </xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.BringIntoView%2A>

trans-unit.source: The requested rectangular space.
trans-unit.target: Den forespurte rektangulær plassen.
